content:
If you'd like to log in using your email, please set your own password.
Once ready, please click the button below.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message asking users to set their own password after selecting an email login option in a social authentication welcome dialog. The text appears below a button prompt, guiding users through the next step. It should be translated for all mobile devices.

usage.context:
<Text textAlign="center" lineHeight="20px" className="welcome-text">
 {currentDeviceType === DeviceType.mobile ? (
 <Trans
 t={t}
 i18nKey="SocialAuthWelcomeDialog:ClickButtonBelow"
 ns="SocialAuthWelcomeDialog"
 components={{
 br: <span style={{ display: "none" }} />,
 }}
 />

<Text textAlign="center" lineHeight="20px" className="welcome-text">
 {currentDeviceType === DeviceType.mobile ? (
 <Trans
 t={t}
 i18nKey="SocialAuthWelcomeDialog:ClickButtonBelow"
 ns="SocialAuthWelcomeDialog"
 components={{
 br: <span style={{ display: "none" }} />,
 }}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description:
The Armenian translation maintains the `
` tag, which might not be necessary or aesthetically pleasing depending on the platform and design. It's generally better to handle line breaks natively in the UI.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion:
Consider removing the `
` tag and using native line break handling in the UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes 'Continuar para {{productName}}' which appears to be a placeholder and should be removed or replaced with the actual product name if it's intended to be displayed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'Continuar para {{productName}}' or replace {{productName} with the actual product name.

ai_spell_check_issues.description:
The Romanian translation maintains the
tag, which may not be the preferred formatting for this context. It's generally better to let the application handle line breaks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion:
Remove the
tags and allow the application's layout to handle line breaks.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Odată ce va fi gata" is a bit awkward. It's not incorrect, but it could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Când veți fi gata' or 'Când sunteți gata' instead of 'Odată ce va fi gata'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'រួඳී' is likely a typo. It should probably be 'រួඳී αφού'.
The phrase 'ඔබ ඔබේ විද්‍යුත් ලිපිනයෙන් (email) ඇතුළත් වීමට කැමති නම්' is a bit awkward. It can be improved for better flow in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ ඔබේ විද්‍යුත් ලිපිනයෙන් (email) ඇතුළත් වීමට කැමතිනම්,
